Articles.Content: Jet propulsion Laboratory! I was there just a few hours ago. It had a lot of cool stuff, including: Rovers, Q&As, movies, and pretty much anything else that has to do with NASA Unmanned things. Pics coming soon! My only complaint is Disney Land like lines and extreme heat. When leaving a lady was rolled into an ambulance, reporting she was "dizzy". Not to mention that back in the car felt like re-entry.
I was there too! What time were you there, I have tons of pictures to put in a post!
Bumped to see if anybody else went there, sorry mods.
Some of my grandfathers buddies from work helped build the Apollo computer module(no, really), and they went to JPL for some reason related to that.
